body.description: Alt. Feature Bullets for BISSELL.com Tangle-Free Brushroll Technology. Cut the hassle not the hair. Up to 40 Minutes2 of Cordless Cleaning. Move throughout your home without being tied to an outlet. Deep Cleaning Furbrush. Powerful pet hair pickup on upholstery, stairs, cars, and more. Removable 24V Max Lithium-ion Battery. Cordless convenience with three cleaning modes. 3-in-1 Capabilities. Easily transforms from a stick vacuum to a handheld or high reach vacuum Clean up messes from floor to ceiling with the BISSELL® CleanView® XR Pet 300W cordless stick vacuum. This powerful cleaner comes with three powerful cleaning modes and a removable lithium-ion battery to make storage and charging a breeze. With up to 40 minutes2 of runtime and 60% more powerful motor than the Shark IX1411 , you’ll be able to clean more effectively and enjoy freedom from being plugged in. The CleanView® XR Pet vacuum easily converts into a handheld vacuum and comes with three specialized tools—including the all-new deep cleaning furbrush—designed to clean the small areas where dirt accumulates. Remove the floor nozzle to use the stick vac as an extension wand to tackle messes high and low throughout your home. Our swivel steering feature and LED headlights make it easy to find and clean where dirt loves to hide. When you’re done cleaning, the wall mount and charging station conveniently store the vacuum and its tools, and ensures your unit will be ready to go for your next clean. BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation® and its mission to help save homeless pets. When you buy a BISSELL® product, you help save pets, too. We’re proud to design products that help make pet messes, odors and pet homelessness disappear.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This vacuum has completely transformed my cleaning routine!
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely thrilled with my Bissell CleanView XR Pet! This vacuum has completely transformed my cleaning routine. Its lightweight and quiet design make it a breeze to maneuver, eliminating the need for multiple vacuums for different surfaces. With the freedom of cordless operation, I can effortlessly zoom around my entire house. The vacuum's ability to lay flat and reach under furniture is a game-changer, and the suction power is truly impressive. I was astounded by the amount of dust and pet hair it effortlessly picked up.The fast-charging battery is a lifesaver, lasting a surprisingly long time. I managed to clean both levels of my house without running out of battery, and there was even enough power left to use the attachment for detailing my baseboards. This vacuum has made cleaning not only more efficient but also surprisingly satisfying. I highly recommend the Bissell CleanView XR Pet to anyone in search of a powerful, versatile, and convenient cleaning solution.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect cordless vacuum
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased! It is surprisingly light weight and quiet, small but mighty! It was extremely easy to assemble and the battery charges fast and lasts! It works perfect on my hardwood floors and even the carpet. The attachments and LED lights are an added bonus! I love that it will maneuver into tight spaces and lay flat to reach under furniture! Very happy with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Replaces your broom and dust buster
reviews.reviewText: I use this product for quick, surface level, cleanups on my hardwood floors in the kitchen and mud room and to clean up the seats in my car. It's lightweight, easy to get into corners and crevices where crumbs tend to aggregate, and the battery lasts an incredibly long time. I actually had to search for the charger the first time I had to recharge it! The only downside is that the suction is lacking a little bit for slightly heavier pieces of dirt, food crumbs, or scattered pieces of kitty litter. However, I would say it gets about 90% of the junk that accumulates on my floor and car seats, which is good enough for me when I need a quick clean up! It's faster and more efficient than a broom and dust buster, which is perfect for our busy life with kids and pets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Defective? No vacuum!
reviews.reviewText: First of all I may have gotten a defective unit but that's no excuse - it should have been tested before going out. I received it last night, changed it and used it this morning. Can't even tell you how disappointed I was when it picked up a little dust and nothing else. I took off the head to check if it was clogged and looked at the brand new filter - it was clean and clear! There was hardly any suction at all - all dirt was on the floor (see pic). Not taking a chance with another Bisell (it's going back) - you shouldn't either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Do not sleep on this cordless! Game changer!
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted a cordless Dyson or other high end battery powered vacuum, but did not have the budget. I went with this bissell model and it has blown away my expectations. Excellent suction power and the battery life is actually pretty impressive if you keep it in the mid range power. Easy to change out tools and use on stairs, couches, etc. I do love the turbo mode for intense pet hair removal on our living room rug, door mats, and dog bed. It doesn't last long on the high suction (maybe 10 min?) but WOW it pulls up a ton of dirt and hair, 100% worth the trade off to have a convenient, cordless vacuum with high power suction. Of course this won't be a perfect trade off for a big clunky plug in vacuum but if you need convenience with still excellent suction power this is 100% worth the money and a great deal compared to other high end models.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent cordless vacuum.
reviews.reviewText: 89/100 Points off for ease of charging and there isn’t a third tool holder. Just two but it comes with three extra… odd but this goes toe to toe with my Dyson and it’s less expensiveUpdate: the charging feature is not bad, but if you could buy a battery to have on deck that would be amazing but unfortunately batteries aren’t sold separately

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Versatile and convenient vacuum!
reviews.reviewText: When I opened the box there were so many parts that I thought it was going to be hard to put together but it was so easy! The individual parts were just all the attachments! Love the low profile head - easily swivels and fits underneath my cabinets where my regular vacuum doesn’t. Lightweight and easy to hold, even with my carpal tunnel issues. Attachments are easy to put on and switch out. Love the hand held attachment - got all the cat hair off my couch in half the time it would have taken me to get out my vacuum and set up the hand attachment. I’m not sure I’ll ever use my bigger vacuum again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Short Battery Life and need to charge overnight
reviews.reviewText: The battery life on this is disappointing. It lasted somewhere between 20-30 mins. It's taken be 3 hours to get one bar of charge on it. I have to charge overnight to get the full charge. This is disappointing, the suction on it was great for my sofas and 3 pets. I really wish it didn't take so long to recharge this thing. I'm debating it on returning it as it's not providing what I need.
